segments.text: How can I help you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am here to have a discussion on your company's investment issue .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , could you tell me your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am James Pond from FAM Company and I am here to discuss it with Nova .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I did it yesterday . Our meeting should be 2 pm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess she forgot your meeting . She is attending an important meeting in the company . Will you have a seat ? May I leave a memo for her ?
segments.speaker: S1
